Lamia:

Lamia Paniqued and slided towards a hole





From: Sandy 
Sent: Su=
nday, March 07, 2010 12:56 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The =
Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Quickstride slowly continues walk=
ing toward the base and realizes that hooves were far too noisey for a quie=
t entrance into it. 

"Okay, those signatures are really strong now, and I =
think we're better off in robot mode."

Rat Trap leaps off his friend's bac=
k.

"Good point. Rat Trap Maximize."

Quickstride gets on his hind lets.

"=
Quickstride, Maximize."

They quietly advance on foot as Rat Trap gets them=
 into the base. 

"Whew, good, the Maximal code still works. Ohh slaaaag, I=
 recogonize the signature, Quickstride... Snake breath herself."

Quickstri=
de narrows his eyes.

"Lamia. Ya know what they say, snakes'n horses don't =
mix. I'm gon' back ta beast mode."

He retransforms and follows Lamia's sig=
nature. Rat Trap follows in robot mode.

"Hey, I wouldn't do that if I were=
 you... Ughh, sometimes you're as stubborn as a jackass."

Quickstride igno=
res Rat Trap and follows Lamia's signature. His hooves clop heavilly on the=
 base floor. He nickers angrilly with a rather mean snort to his voice. He =
then spots her and lets out an angry whinney, stamping his front hooves lou=
dly on the floor. He continues his equine fuss until another Maximal hears =
the alarm.

Rat Trap catches up.

"Awww maaaaan".

> Rat Trap looks up and then a=
t the base.

de looks up to Rat Trap.
> 
> "I'm just as scared as you are, but we made a=
 promise and we have to keep it."
> 
> Rat Trap swallows hard.
>

 - right. Wheels and Lord Elder are countn' on us." Let's - go find our com=
rades'n get the word up on what's going on."
>

into the base's parameter with ears forward, and his head turning to look o=
ver his shoulders.
